jade.mtp.http2
Class HTTPServer.ServerThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      jade.mtp.http2.HTTPServer.ServerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CascomGatewayServer.CascomServerThread
Enclosing class:
HTTPServer
public static class HTTPServer.ServerThread
extends java.lang.Thread

ServerThread which reads the input, parses HTTP request using HTTPIO and delivers message to agent platform or let ConnectionManager to handle the request if it is not FIPA-request.
